primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners with demanding jobs who need reliable dog walking services during work hours.

problemsNeeds: Lack of time to walk their dogs
Need for trustworthy and reliable service
behaviors: Use the app to schedule regular walks
Likely to use premium features for convenience

primarySegments.name: Elderly Dog Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who own dogs but may have physical limitations that make dog walking challenging.

problemsNeeds: Difficulty walking dogs due to physical limitations
Desire for trusted and friendly walkers
behaviors: Use the app for occasional walks
Prefer phone support over in-app communication
Rely on reviews and recommendations for choosing walkers

primarySegments.name: Young Urban Dwellers
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in cities who own dogs and seek convenient ways to manage pet care.

behaviors: Use the app for last-minute bookings
Engage with social features and community events
